title: Need Help In champ select , Lagging in champ select ( after update new client )

replies.body:
We've seen some players report performance issues in champ select when running the New Client on lower-end computer hardware. You may be able to resolve this by **enabling** low spec mode and **disabling** Animation. You can find these settings in the client options (cog icon, top-right), as shown in the screenshot below:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Let me know if this fixed it!
Ty for help me Rito it a bit better now , but in the future you guy you guy gonna fix this right :?{{summoner:4}}

The client is still in Beta, so yes, there are improvements being made all the time and I'm excited to see what the future holds for the Client as a whole. :)

If you have any other questions, let me know.
